app_descript:
Hack Latino

Hack Latino is a vibrant community tailored for Latinos in the U.S., aimed at connecting businesses and emphasizing the significance of Latin America. This app makes it easy for users to discover local businesses and restaurants, share personal experiences, and leave feedback about each visit. It‚Äôs a platform designed by Latinos, for Latinos.
